name: 3-3 Gravity (Post Jam Version (With Ceckpoints))
description:
READ BEFORE PLAYING: Sometimes the browser version won't play music. If this happens just reload or download one of the files below to play offline.The original game was made for the 2018 game maker's toolkit game jam. This is another version that fixes a few issues. The original: https://antiquegearstudio.itch.io/3-3-gravity

This is a platformer without gravity so you must be careful of where you jump!

Fight robots and watch out for spikes as you go to turn the artificial gravity back on in your spaceship.

Thanks to Mark Brown for hosting this jam!

I made everything except for the music. That was done by Kevin MacLeod.

Oh yeah for those of you on discord I'm Vincent. Just wanted to make that clear.

Thanks for checking it out! (Don't forget to vote please! (If you want to))

You can also play this on the Scirra Arcade for whatever reason:

https://www.scirra.com/arcade/action-games/3-3-gravity-34277

Check out some of my other junk:

The Gravity Machine Prototype:

https://antiquegearstudio.itch.io/the-gravity-machine

The Grand Illusion:

www.scirra.com/arcade/adventure-games/the-grand-illusion-33020

Trump Tower Trouble:

www.scirra.com/arcade/tutorial-games/trump-tower-trouble-33116
